title: Really? 14 day for this?
body:
First off, I had been getting shit junglers and bot lanes all day on all of my accounts. So I come in this game and we're 15 minutes in. What happens? Bot lane loses bot turret at 8 minutes, AND is 0-8 by 15 minutes. Jungler is 0-3 complete useless. They shove down mid with rift and get our inhib at 16-17 minutes. So then the bot lane starts running their mouth when I say "jesus bot can u stop." 

EDIT: I ended up carrying this shit bot lane hard af and of course they get a win and get to report me, yet when I report both of them for INTING nothing happens. Your company is trash Riot.

I mean this game is really getting absurd. This liberal company caters to people who intentionally feed ruining the games of others, and instead of making them apologize for ruining their teammates 30 minutes of being stuck in the game, they allow them to report anyone who doesn't say "GREAT JOB GOING 0-10 KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK SUMMONER!" You teach these kids not to take responsibility for anything just like Obama did. You teach them to act offended, claim the person is racist, and then report instead of taking responsibility. Why is there even a mute function in this game? Grow some thicker skin. No wonder this game is getting shit on by Fortnite.

Game 1
In-Game
Negatif: open?
Negatif: sick invade camille
Negatif: glad you were useful
Negatif: lee ganks again before you do mid lane im leaving
Negatif: can you gank?
Negatif: hes ganked me 3x
Negatif: np all im saying is 1 more time he comes and you dont
Negatif: ur loss
Negatif: 5-0 bot lmfao
Negatif: i had lee sin mid 3 x
Negatif: you just straight up suck lol
Negatif: hello
Negatif: jesus bot
Negatif: can u stop
Negatif: must be nice
Negatif: get makeawish bot lane on my team
Negatif: last wish was to int in game of league
Negatif: i mean youre ezreal
Negatif: how hard is it to farm safely
Negatif: w/e not worth the stress im done
Negatif: kids dont want to win
Negatif: keeping them busy while you get baron for free obv
Negatif: leave it for me plz ill brt
Negatif: how are ppl dying with 3 on me
Post-Game
Negatif: geez thank god for this mundo
Negatif: helmet wearing bot lane
Negatif: how we win that
Game 2
Pre-Game
Negatif: ap btw
In-Game
Negatif: happy inting
Negatif: plz dont let ahri do this unpunished
Negatif: literally fking free
Negatif: im done
Negatif: youre garbage af shaco you sit there for 6 minutes while i ping then you come and the only thing you do is take cannon
Negatif: 1 by 1
Negatif: no that was pyke trying to be a hero and make a play cost us 5 deaths
Negatif: classic pyke player, would rather lose a game to look cool in a play
Post-Game
Negatif: pyke tries to make 2v5 hero play and ends up getting us aced and then says i tilted him... what do you think that did to the whole team?
Negatif: all because you wanted to look spicy

replies.body:
You're not forced to spew rainbows from your mouth and sparkles from your ass every time in chat. You're completely free to simply **not** insult someone.

It's easy.

Instead of typing this;

>Negatif: youre garbage af shaco you sit there for 6 minutes while i ping then you come and the only thing you do is take cannon
Negatif: 1 by 1
Negatif: no that was pyke trying to be a hero and make a play cost us 5 deaths
Negatif: classic pyke player, would rather lose a game to look cool in a play

You type this;

>EDIT: I ended up carrying this shit bot lane hard af and of course they get a win and get to report me, yet when I report both of them for INTING nothing happens. Your company is trash Riot.

Having a bad game =/= inting

Your replies in this thread speak volumes

You didn't learn from your chat restrictions. I suggest you learn from this suspension that this sort of behavior is not acceptable. It is glaringly obvious what you did wrong - flaming and harassing your team.

If you refuse to change your behavior, the next stop is a permanent ban on your account.

> [{quoted}](name=Negatif,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=858H1qyb,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-11-05T04:38:07.237+0000)
>
> Thanks for the robotic by-the-book response lmao. Riot has literally programmed these kids to be complete mindless dolts. Basically what you're saying is that I should join these kids and intentionally feed every single game, but just not speak in chat, and then I should report everyone who gets upset about it. Gotcha.
> 
> EDIT: I highly expected this comment to be from an unranked person. What do ya know? Unranked. You also literally intentionally feed every single one of your games based on your KDAs.

so a couple of things:

you are right, that is a by the book answer, but Riot does not encourage Inting or brainwash them, nor do I see any riot posts even mentioning the encouragement of inting, you are not required to speak in chat, nor is it right for you to insult someone, you agreed to a term of service set there telling you "be respectful" and so does the summoners code "have fun, but not at anyone's expense" no one is forcing you to do anything, you don't have to int, you don't have to report people, but sometimes, people don't want %%%%s like you insulting them because they are bad at the game, this is why League is dying, bad players are not encouraged to improve, but discouraged to play the game outright by people like you.

also, rank dosen't mean shit, it shows your dedication to the game, not skill.
Intentionally feeding means they **WANT** the enemy to gain gold for the purpose of causing their team to lose, KDA is based on performance, a bad player can have a shit KDA, but they aren't feeding.

check your shit before you talk it.

Everyone here has been trying to give you valid input, and you choose to shame them all.

I hope you get banned.

Go ahead, see how quickly you get banned for intentionally feeding.

Or you could accept you're wrong here and stop being a jerkbag to others.
You don't get banned for "soft-inting." These kids just feed their ass off and don't type in chat and riot rewards them with banning others whose games they ruin.

That's because "soft inting" is indistinguishable from playing bad.

Maybe these players you're calling "soft inters" aren't actually doing it intentionally?

> [{quoted}](name=Negatif,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=858H1qyb,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-05T05:01:17.407+0000)
>
> You don't get banned for "soft-inting." These kids just feed their ass off and don't type in chat and riot rewards them with banning others whose games they ruin.

Well... I agreed up until you just had to throw that childish logic in at the end. That sucks. Why cant you just be pragmatic and leave your fucking emotions out of it? Fuck. "Riot rewards them with banning others" ... just stop with that child's rhetoric. It hurts the cause. 

People start to think its just angry butthurt children who think Riots system sucks, because of shit like you are saying. Some rational adults actually agree with you, but then we cringe at your shitty elementary school play ground style of arguing the point.

This was a penalty. You earned that 14-day ban overtime all on your own. 
You went out of your way of making every player miserable. Well, there's a consequence for that.
And you just received it. 

So yea, who cares what if your team played poorly? 
I get shit junglers. I get shit players all the time. 
Hell, I am shit sometimes. But I don't harass players for it. 
People are here to play a video game. Not putting the time to become Pro players for LCS.
Ive never once said anything nice to someone ruining my game... yet I have never been punished... why is that possible? Could it be that youre wrong? That what youre saying isnt true? Hmmmm

You think that's trouble? Dante from dmc been through worse
https://orig00.deviantart.net/a69d/f/2015/212/d/f/devil_may_cry_meme_by_the4thsnake-d93lzbh.jpg

You know, its funny. The mods removing my posts showing how people intentionally fed their games and are still playing just shows how Riot supports the intentionally feeding community, but bans someone for calling someone "poopoohead."

On a side note, I literally straight soft inted a game with 13 deaths in 20 minutes to test, 9 reports and nothing happened LOL! Hilarious. I think I might get someone banned too for raging at me. This is how I am going to play this game from now on.
